H0.text: where does the paraguay river start and end. Amazon River

H1.text: where does the paraguay river start and end. Rio de la Plata

H2.text: where does the paraguay river start and end. Iguazú River

H3.text: where does the paraguay river start and end. Paraná River

A4.text: The Paraguay River flows about 2,695 kilometres (1,675 mi) from its headwaters in the Brazilian state of Mato Grosso to its confluence with the Paraná River north of Corrientes and Resistencia.

A5.text: The Paraguay River flows into the Paraná River, which is part of the Río de la Plata.

A6.text: The Paraguay River is a tributary of the Paraná River.
